content.title: Upcoming Webinars
description: ​PPC Advertising in the Legal Industry: Challenges and Opportunities

It can be challenging to keep up with the constantly evolving PPC advertising landscape when you are focused on running a busy practice! Join Samantha Larrus and Jessica Risso, members of the Justia Amplify team, as they unpack the challenges of advertising your law firm with Google Ads and explore new opportunities to leverage PPC ads for growth.
​How Laws Get Online: Challenges in Free Law

Join us as Sara Frug and Craig Newton, Co-Directors of the Legal Information Institute at Cornell Law School, lead a unique webinar exploring the nuances of codifying federal statutes and regulations, as well as key issues regarding how and when governments place private works into the public domain by incorporating them into statutes or regulations. This presentation is accredited for one hour of general MCLE credit in California.

description: ​Great Life, Great Practice: The Four Cornerstones of Law Firm Success

Missed the live broadcast? Stream this presentation in which Kimberly T. Lee, attorney and founder of Desert Law Group, discusses critical business skills necessary to grow a successful solo practice or small law firm. These skills are not taught in law school but now you have the chance to learn them whenever, wherever convenient for you!
